title: Data from Sustentarea's Global Syndemic Project

what: Gini index of per capita household income in Brazil — gini_index
title: Gini index of per capita household income in Brazil — gini_index
text: Gini index per capita household income Brazil's municipalities years 1991, 2000 2010.

title: Gini index of per capita household income in Brazil — gini_index
Gini index of per capita household income in Brazil — gini_index
text: tibble 16,695 rows 4 columns: year census year Gini index calculated (1991, 2000, 2010).  R class: integer municipality_code unique identification code Brazilian municipality.  R class: integer municipality name Brazilian municipality.  R class: character gini_index Gini index value municipality, ranging 0 (perfect equality) 1 (perfect inequality).  R class: double

title: Gini index of per capita household income in Brazil — gini_index
text: Brazilian Institute Geography Statistics (IBGE).

title: Gini index of per capita household income in Brazil — gini_index
text: Gini index measure income inequality, ranging 0 (perfect equality) 1 (perfect inequality). dataset provides Gini indices Brazilian municipalities across three census years (1991, 2000, 2010). Brazilian Institute Geography Statistics (IBGE) Automatic Retrieval System (SIDRA) provides Gini data municipality year 1991 (Table 155). However, dataset includes information three census periods (1991, 2000, 2010) processed Institute Applied Economic Research (IPEA), access complete census data. raw data available Brazil's public health system (SUS) platform DATASUS/Tabnet. can accessed directly following link: http://tabnet.datasus.gov.br/cgi/ibge/censo/cnv/ginibr.def

title: Gini index of per capita household income in Brazil — gini_index
text: data munging process performed R documented using Quarto publishing system. entire process fully reproducible available following GitHub repository: https://github.com/sustentarea/gs-data-munging-1

title: Gini index of per capita household income in Brazil — gini_index
text: variable names follow tidyverse style guide , using lowercase letters underscores separating words (snake_case) clarity consistency.

title: Gini index of per capita household income in Brazil — gini_index
text: special variable classes used dataset.

title: Gini index of per capita household income in Brazil — gini_index
text: Instituto Brasileiro de Geografia e Estatística, Instituto de Pesquisas Econômicas e Aplicadas, & Ministério da Saúde. (n.d.). Índice de Gini da renda domiciliar per capita segundo município — Período: 1991, 2000 e 2010 [Gini index per capita household income municipality—period: 1991, 2000, 2010] [Dataset]. DATASUS - Tabnet. Retrieved November 16, 2024, http://tabnet.datasus.gov.br/cgi/ibge/censo/cnv/ginibr.def
